overview: From the Killers' first release in 2004, the alternative rock group from Las Vegas made the music world and fans stand and take note. This unauthorized documentary provides a behind-the-scenes look at the Grammy nominees via interviews with band members and their close friends. Also included are never-before-published photos, rare performance footage and extras such as an interactive digital discography and a Killers quiz.
title: The Killers: Leaving Las Vegas
